RuleSet.Name: src/schema/buff/SchemaBuffSchema.java
RuleSet.Descr: Java 21 buffer implementation of a $SchemaName$ schema.

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaBuffSchemaJava
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$.buff

RuleSet.GenRule: $switch HasDefSchema yes empty default reallyImplSchemaParseEnum$
$implBuffSchemaBuffParseEnumParse$$implBuffSchemaBuffParseEnumOrdinal$
newMap.put( "$Name$", $popto EnumDef Name$.$Name$ );
newMap.put( Integer.valueOf( $popto EnumDef Name$.$Name$.ordinal() ), $popto EnumDef Name$.$Name$ );

$implBuffSchemaSchemaConstructor$$iterate SchemaRefs( first implBuffSchemaNewSchema each empty empty implBuffSchemaNewSchema )$$iterate SchemaRefs( first implBuffSchemaFileImport each empty empty implBuffSchemaFileImport )$$iterate Id16Generators( each implBuffNextIdGen empty empty)$$iterate Id32Generators( each implBuffNextIdGen empty empty)$$iterate Id64Generators( each implBuffNextIdGen empty empty)$$iterate DbKeyHash128Generators( each implBuffNextIdGen empty empty )$$iterate DbKeyHash160Generators( each implBuffNextIdGen empty empty )$$iterate DbKeyHash224Generators( each implBuffNextIdGen empty empty )$$iterate DbKeyHash256Generators( each implBuffNextIdGen empty empty )$$iterate DbKeyHash384Generators( each implBuffNextIdGen empty empty )$$iterate DbKeyHash512Generators( each implBuffNextIdGen empty empty )$$iterate UuidGenerators( each implBuffNextIdGen empty empty )$$iterate Uuid6Generators( each implBuffNextIdGen empty empty )$$iterate SchemaTables( each implTableMethods empty empty )$
protected I$DefSchemaName$$TableName$Table table$TableName$;
protected I$DefSchemaName$$TableName$Factory factory$TableName$;
table$TableName$ = null; // new $DefSchemaName$Buff$TableName$Table();
factory$TableName$ = new $DefSchemaName$Buff$TableName$DefaultFactory();
$implBuffSchemaTableTableAccessors$$implBuffSchemaTableFactoryAccessors$
$reference RefSchema implBuffSchemaFileImport$
$reference RefSchema implBuffSchemaNewSchema$
